question: Pod manifest running as non-root user 1000 with fsGroup 2000.
suggested_answer:
apiVersion: v1
kind: Pod
metadata:
  name: app
spec:
  securityContext:
    fsGroup: 2000
    runAsNonRoot: true
    runAsUser: 1000
  containers:
  - name: busybox
    image: busybox
    command:
    - sh
    - -c
    - sleep 3600
